metadata.title: CVE-2024-34997 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** joblib v1.4.2 was discovered to contain a deserializationvulnerability via the componentjoblib.numpy_pickle::NumpyArrayWrapper().read_array(). NOTE: this isdisputed by the supplier because NumpyArrayWrapper is only used duringcaching of trusted content.

criterions.comment: joblib package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
